description: Verify your Plex accounts and see which servers are available. Search user access across all linked servers with fuzzy matching. Authorize new accounts with a simple flow and complete setup automatically.

tools.name: plex_status
tools.title: Plex Server Status
tools.description: Validates configured Plex accounts and summarizes server availability.

refresh.description: When true, refresh cached server and user data.

include_user_count.description: When true, count distinct users across servers.

tools.name: plex_lookup_user
tools.title: Plex User Lookup
tools.description: Search for Plex user access across all configured servers using fuzzy matching.

query.description: Email, username, or partial name to search for.

refresh.description: When true, bypass caches and fetch fresh data from Plex.

max_results.description: Max number of matches to return (default 25).

tools.name: plex_generate_auth_url
tools.title: Generate Plex Authorization URL
tools.description: Creates a Plex authentication URL and PIN so you can authorize a new account.

client_identifier.description: Optional Plex client identifier to associate with the login request. If omitted, a random identifier is generated.

tools.name: plex_check_auth_pin
tools.title: Check Plex Authorization PIN
tools.description: Polls Plex for the status of an authorization PIN and returns the token when ready.

pin_id.description: Numeric Plex PIN identifier returned by plex_generate_auth_url.

client_identifier.description: Client identifier returned alongside the authorization URL.
